content:
State Token Conditional Headers

  • If-State-Match

    • Similar functionality to the If-Match header in Section 14.25 of RFC 2068

    If-State-Match = “If-State-Match” “:” (“AND” | “OR”) 1#(”<“ State-Token “>“)

  • AND: MAY execute method if all state tokens identify the state of the resource

  • OR: MAY execute method if at least one of the state tokens identifies the state of the resource
